DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to evaluate MR/PET with both functional and molecular imaging on the prediction of prognosis in patients with suspected pancreatic cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Prognosis With Integrated MRI/PET in Patients With Pancreatic Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The results of MR/PET will be compared prospectively to dedicated MDCT or MR imaging, pathologic results, and clinical outcomes to assess the value of MR/PET in pancreatic cancers.
DOC.criteria: 1. Diagnosed as pancreatic cancer 2. Between 20~90 years old 3. ECOG 02 4. Normal renal function 5. Measurable tumor size (>1cm) 1. Contraindication for MRI exam 2. Claustrophobia 3. Renal insufficiency 4. Other malignancy 5. Pregnancy and lactating women
